title: So, should Morde's passive no longer work on minions?
body:
Shoutout to @Soul Furnace for bringing this up in my other thread.

Mordekaiser has always been really hard to balance mainly due to ONE big issue with his kit.

His passive; Iron Man.
Not only is it awesome in team fights and dueling due to it giving you a substantial shield but it's VERY effective in lane due to him having a ton of victims to generate shield off, in form of YOUR minions, basically turning them against you if you dare to fight him.

His spells all being AoE make it easy for him to build up a massive shield on them and make any form of harass and trading useless against him if you're not ranged, then again every melee struggles against Ranged.

It's highly unintuitive and not very interaction and what's even worse; Really unhealthy and unfair due to his opponents not really being rewarded by choosing favorable fights and playing around it.

It's the reason he was kept in such an awful state ever since his release and maybe it's about time we'd remove this feature in favor of balancing him more outside of the laning phase and giving him actual windows of powers and ways to deal with him in lane.

So, I personally would be a fan of removing his minion draining in favor of other buffs that make him feel more like a juggernaut and not let him win by default just because you just happen to have a ton of minions.

What are your thoughts on the matter?
Yay or nay?

http://s2.favim.com/orig/28/black-sabbath-gif-iron-man-ozzy-osbourne-paranoid-Favim.com-233856.gif

Edit;
To clarify; I do not suggest SIMPLY removing the minion aspect without any form of buffs.
The prime problem with balancing Morde is how oppressive his laning can feel like and how few ways there are to actually play against him in lane.
If your champion doesn't counter Morde you're boned, it's unfair and very poor design.

Making him way less unhealthy opens up avenues in which he can be buffed, giving him some love and making feel like a real Juggernaut while eliminating most of the frustration when playing AGAINST him

I'm not good in terms of numbers and balancement, so i will say this:

What me and, i believe, most morde mains like about him is his unique mechanics due to his passive, which force him _to play around enemy units and around his positioning in lane_. His shortcomings of cc and dashes, blinks, high defensive stats etc are due to the iron man and the possibility of "always shield never die", which makes morde himself and satisfying to play. We have to remember it.

This thing distinguishes morde mains from casual morde players. These ones can spam E and W in lane and still lose every trade because they can't position themselves properly, or simply don't know when to go in. The shield is good IF you can manage it, not in every occasion.

Plus, if these changes were actually made, morde would become a toplaner vs melee only champion, countered by every ranged or not exclusively melee champ, because he couldnt shield himself from any kind of damage. Goodbye mid morde or bot morde, he would lose his possibility to go to other lanes like a numero 1. 

So riot came out with the "morde is a juggernaut" thing and "his passive and his old E are toxic and hard to balance", but we all know this isn't true and he is (and was) one of the most counterable champions in the game, nobody complained about him etc.  I know riot have "chose this path" for him and i don't even ask for a revert, but let's keep calling him mordekaiser, there are way more toxic champions out there, let's help make him healthy without trashing his identity further.
